name: BeforeTheSchoolBellRings
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Delving into the important issues affecting people of color who are parents of students in the K-12 public educational system, K-12 Education: Untangled -- a solo podcast -- provides the information and practical actions that parents can take to be more aware of and involved with the issues affecting their children’s educational attainment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
